list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor and improve logging and type hinting.
Replaced `typing.Optional` with `str | None` for cleaner type hints, adjusted logging to include a message format, and fixed a bug by correctly assigning the 'Other' classification to the document. Removed unused imports for better code clarity.

MESSAGE.value:
Add support for skipping initial documents during indexing
Introduced a `--skip` argument to skip the first N documents in spaces, enhancing control over document processing. Also added logging for skipped documents and error handling for classification failures. Updated default classifications to include "Changelog."

Add classification support and flexible document filtering
Introduce 'classification' field to documents and expand filtering logic to support regex-based title exclusions and classification-based ignores. Update schema, argument parser, and processing logic to align with these enhancements, improving document indexing flexibility and specificity.

Refactor and improve logging and type hinting.
Replaced `typing.Optional` with `str | None` for cleaner type hints, adjusted logging to include a message format, and fixed a bug by correctly assigning the 'Other' classification to the document. Removed unused imports for better code clarity.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Refactor and improve logging and type hinting.
Replaced `typing.Optional` with `str | None` for cleaner type hints, adjusted logging to include a message format, and fixed a bug by correctly assigning the 'Other' classification to the document. Removed unused imports for better code clarity.
